sentences: Marcus Lambkin (born 1971) better known by the pseudonym Shit Robot is an Irish electronic musician and DJ.
While working as a DJ in New York in 2000 he befriended James Murphy, later of LCD Soundsystem, and started a DJ partnership with him.
Lambkin moved to rural Germany in 2004 and started producing his own music, with a number of releases on DFA Records from 2006.
He released his debut album From the Cradle to the Rave in September 2010 to positive reviews from Entertainment.ie and NME.
